data.title: Paessler positioned in the Gartner Magic Quadrant
data.meta_description: Paessler AG is positioned in the Gartner Magic Quadrant for Network Performance Monitoring & Diagnostics 2016 alongside several large enterprise solutions.
data.text:
Paessler AG’s PRTG Network Monitor is the easiest way to monitor your complete IT infrastructure. Its ease of use and close-to-practice feature set makes it the perfect solution for monitoring small and medium-sized networks. Once again Paessler positioned itself in the Gartner Magic Quadrant for Network Performance Monitoring and Diagnostics 2016 alongside several large enterprise solutions: Read the full report here and see how PRTG can make the lives of your clients easier.

Your client’s advantages of using PRTG are:

One solution for everything: Monitor all your hardware, applications, and virtual environments from industry leading vendors – Cisco, VMware, Microsoft, Oracle, DELL, HP.

Ease-of-use: PRTG is so easy-to-use that users save 2-5 hours per week to concentrate on other more important tasks.

All-in-one: With a fair and easy licensing scheme you can easily upgrade from a smaller license to a bigger one – PRTG grows with your needs.

Customization: Thanks to PRTG’s powerful API you can easily implement your own scripts and tailor your monitoring to your needs.

Assure IT Security with Monitoring

Security has always been a main topic for all IT managers. But a network is only secure if all classic security components such as firewalls or virus scanners are online and up-to-date. You need a central dashboard for the big overview and a fall-back system for discovery of malware activity while being aware of physical hazards such as fires, floods, heat or theft.

PRTG Network Monitor is an affordable and easy to use monitoring solution for SMEs that offers all features required to assure maximum security for the entire IT infrastructure:

Comprehensive monitoring features (also environmental aspects)

API for monitoring non-standard components

Unusual behaviour detection for discovery of malware activity

Central dashboard functionality

Comprehensive means for notifying and alerting

Read more on how to assure maximum security for your infrastructure with monitoring:

Link to white paper: https://www.paessler.com/press/whitepapers/meta-security

Link to Content page: https://www.paessler.com/meta-security

You want to test PRTG right away? sales for a quote tailored to your specific requirements.

Once again Paessler was Positioned in the Gartner Magic Quadrant, will they make it again next year?

Paul Leslie – Business Development Manager
